text.div:
If I am so sick or seriously injured that I cannot express my own medical treatment preferences, and if I am not expected to live without additional treatment for my illness, disease, condition or injury, then I want my medical care team to know that these are the things that are most important to me:

  • Avoiding prolonged dependence on machines
  • Not being a physical burden to my family
  • Dying at home

coding.display: Goals, preferences, and priorities under certain health conditions [Reported]

extension.valueString: If I am so sick or seriously injured that I cannot express my own medical treatment preferences, and if I am not expected to live without additional treatment for my illness, disease, condition or injury, then I want my medical care team to know that these are the things that are most important to me
Not being a physical burden to my family
